column1: I wish it were. It should be. But #NovemberIsComing and Pelosi knows that we’ll clean out the WH then. Right now, she’s focused on coronavirus and helping Americans. You should try it.

Just making note of California’s coronavirus numbers in light of the current riots. As of May 29th total cases stand at 106,744 and total deaths at 4,137.
